activities: The company receives human resources data and general information relating to its current and former employees, in addition to information regarding potential future employees during the hiring process.  Additionally, the Company receives data and general information regarding customers and potential customers as well as vendors.  This information is transferred to the United States primarily for record keeping and administrative purposes.  The Company uses information from customers, prospective customers, vendors, business partners and other third parties for purposes of marketing, communications about products or services, facilitating transactions, customer support and other general commercial use.
personaldata: On-line, manually processed data and human resources data
